mapper.select:
select id, platform_code, platform_name, warehouse_name, camera_url, platform_status, remarks, create_time, created_user, up_time, up_user from platform
and platform_name like concat('%',#{form.platformName},'%')
and warehouse_name like concat('%',#{form.warehouseName},'%')
order by create_time desc
select platform_code as code from platform where date_format(create_time,'%Y%m%d') = #{curDate} order by create_time desc limit 1
select id, platform_code, platform_name, warehouse_id, warehouse_name, camera_url, platform_status, remarks, create_time, created_user, up_time, up_user from platform where id = #{id}
